name: Parasite Royale
description:
Battle Royale Game in development using the Unreal Engine. This is a first build with lots of bugs and things broken. Just a working prototype. You have to have steam open and have someone else jump in after you start game. 

Press: 

tab: to see map

space: to jump

f: to pick up weapons

e: to jump out of ufo

right click: to shoot

r: to reload

wasd: to move

mouse: to aim
